articles.author: Jennifer A Dlouhy, Josh Wingrove, Yoshiaki Nohara
articles.title: Trump Says Japan Deal Reached With Tariff Rate Set at 15% - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: President Donald Trump reached a trade deal with Japan that will impose 15% tariffs on US imports from the country, including its auto sector, while creating a $550 billion fund backed by the Japanese to make investments in America.
articles.content: President Donald Trump reached a trade deal with Japan that will impose 15% tariffs on US imports from the country, including its auto sector, while creating a $550 billion fund backed by the Japanes… [+269 chars]
